data.taskTitle: Debug startup errors in squad session
Debug startup errors in squad session
data.approach: Analyze screenshot showing startup errors: Exit code 1 from get-current-session-id, sibling tool call errors, TASK_NOT_FOUND from bd show, NO_SESSION_VAR. These indicate the /squad:start flow is broken - session ID retrieval, pre-registration check, and task lookup are all failing. Will trace through the startup scripts to find root causes.

data.taskTitle: Debug startup errors in squad session
summary: Added Step 0 (tmux + session ID checks) to /squad:start before any other work
Added --wait flag to get-current-session-id for race condition on fresh startup
Made startup checks sequential to prevent sibling tool call cascade failures
Added clear error messages for NOT_IN_TMUX and missing session ID

data.taskTitle: Debug startup errors in squad session
summary: Made get-current-session-id auto-retry (5 attempts, 1s apart) instead of failing immediately
Added tmux check to SessionStart hook - agent sees NOT_IN_TMUX warning in context automatically
Removed agent-level Step 0 from start.md - environment validation now handled by tools/hooks
start.md back to clean flow: parse params → get session ID (resilient) → check pre-reg → work

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Startup Error Logging and Diagnostics
suggestedTasks.description: Create a robust error tracking mechanism for application initialization. Add detailed error capture that provides clear, actionable diagnostic information when startup fails. Modify existing startup routines to generate structured error logs with specific error codes, component information, and potential resolution steps.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve user experience by providing clearer startup error diagnostics

suggestedTasks.title: Review and Consolidate Application Initialization Error Handling
suggestedTasks.description: Audit current startup process across multiple components to identify and standardize error handling patterns. Create a centralized error management strategy that provides consistent error reporting and potential self-healing mechanisms during application initialization.
suggestedTasks.reason: Multiple error codes suggest fragmented error handling approach

gotchas: Multiple potential failure points in startup sequence

documentationNeeds: Update troubleshooting guide with new error diagnostic approach
